item.description: Sunday Sunlight and anxiolytic flora drink themselves silly; an eastern pinch of sky blurts like it forgot to take its pills. The worm has wept all Sunday while you were reading the newspaper. Of watering the taste of a fleck of midnight fruit between your teeth.
